name: Tank Keeper
description:
You need to help a tank go through some caves by digging and gathering ressources

This is a tiny game made in Pico 8 using less than 1024 compressed bytes for Pico1k jam 2022

Resources:

  • white rocks: fuel that you must bring back to the tank
  • brown rocks: upgrade your mining power
  • yellow rocks: temporary boost your move speed

Your tank will only move if there is no rocks on the path and if fuel is sufficient. Use arrow keys to move your character and mine simply by repeatedly colliding with a rock. The deeper you go into the caves the harder the rocks will be, but you will find more resources.
